name: Model
shortDesc: The AWS::ApiGateway::Model resource defines the structure of a request or response payload for an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) method.

properties.name: ContentType
properties.desc: The content type for the model.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: A description that identifies this model.

properties.name: Name
properties.desc: A name for the mode. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the model name. For more information, see Name Type.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.desc: The ID of a REST API with which to associate this model.

properties.name: Schema
properties.desc: The schema to use to transform data to one or more output formats.
